name: Abbey Lodge

reviews.title: Not bad for the value and location
reviews.text: Abbey Lodge had a great location, good breakfast, nice breakfast room and John was a great host. My one piece of advice would be for some renewing of some of the decor in the bedrooms. A simple change to nice clean, bright white comforter and some brighter decor would give a very updated feel to Abbey Lodge that it needs. It has such a charming character about it on the outside and has so much potential inside. Overall though, a very nice, clean and centrally located place in Killarney that I would recommend.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2003, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we arived in Killarney we saw the lodge and my wife said if we we would get a room in the arch she would love to stay there what does a loving man...just walk in and ask if there is a vacancy..
reviews.title: very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: go it right away...wife happy...me happy....so we stayed 7 nights..
reviews.title: Oops, we forget to plan this part.

likes.liked: — The clean, spacious room.The great amounts hot water, and the quiet.
likes.disliked: — Only having a few days to spend there.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: everybody was very nice and friendly...the breakfast was great...if i ever return to Killarney my first choice would be the lodge and not a 4 or 5 star hotel
reviews.title: A wonderful stay

likes.disliked: — lack of warmth from host and staff

reviews.title: Warm and Welcoming
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Abbey Lodge last November. Of all our accommodations, Abbey Lodge was by far the nicest. Spotlessly clean, beautifully decorated, and close to everything. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and are returning in September 2006 for another two nights.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room (large window) and the privat bath was clean and nicely decorated. Even TV and HiFi are present. The breakfast is made special for you. You can choose between different hot offers. Wonderful location with parkin lots in front- and behind the house. Easy drive to the Ring of Kerry and Dingle.
reviews.title: Wonderful location

description: A genuine Irish welcome awaits you at Abbey Lodge. Our 4 star guest house is family run and boasts 15 luxurious ensuite bedrooms. We are situated 2 minutes from Killarney town center, complimentary WIFI is available and we also provide a PC in our lounge. The house is tastefully decorated throughout and features many interesting antiques and art. The accent is on friendly personal service backed by the highest standards throughout.
